data.name: Doki Doki Tri-Line Quest
data.detailed_description:
Doki Doki Tri-Line Quest is a match 3 rpg game for adults only. Investigate the island of Elira to find your childhood best friend and discover all the secrets that this island hides.

What is the difference with other games for adults?


The big difference of the game is that it is completely consensual, if you want to get the sex scenes you will have to fulfill errands or win battles against enemies so the passing of the game is not interrupted between playing the story and looking for sex scenes.

Game plot


Line is a half elf half succubus who due to her shyness and a life of high moral standards due to being part elf she never managed to develop her succubus side. All this gets worse when her best friend leaves town leaving a cryptic message for Line. Since that day she has lost a part of herself and waits for her coming of age day to be granted her fairy companion to search for her friend.

Gameplay

The gameplay of the game is that of a classic rpg where you see your character from above and you can interact with characters and investigate places in the town and the forest.But everything changes when it comes to fighting, the game becomes a match 3 game where your character must match different types of blocks to do different types of damage and prevent your character from losing all his life and clothes D: (oh no, oh my gosh).

Character customization

The game has a lot of clothes which enhance the different types of damage like any other game, but the costumes are more lewd :v

All the characters performing sexual acts are of legal age.

data.short_description: Go on an adventure of self-discovery and search for your dear childhood friend who left the village years ago under strange circumstances. Doki Doki Tri-Line Quest is an rpg game in combination with match3 and exclusive for adults, with sex scenes and voices in English.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 880M, AMD Radeon R9 Series, or similar
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

content_descriptors.notes: Doki Doki Tri-Line QUest contains animated illustrations of explicit sexual situations, nudity, and cartoon violence.
